summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of 47th Avenue South from South Dakota Street to South Bradford Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25747 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of payment by bonds.
